description:
An all-natural refuge from the elements for everyday commutes or shoulder season travels, the Ainsworth Hooded Jacket features 100% heavyweight felted merino wool that’s naturally warm, breathable, and durable. The relaxed hood provides added protection, while zippered pockets secure your essentials.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Ainsworth Hooded Jacket - Mens
